get.description:
Provides the details of the backed up item. This is an asynchronous operation. To know the status of the operation,
call the GetItemOperationResult API.

parameters.name: fabricName
parameters.description: Fabric name associated with the backed up item.

parameters.name: containerName
parameters.description: Container name associated with the backed up item.

parameters.name: protectedItemName
parameters.description: Backed up item name whose details are to be fetched.

get.description: Provides a pageable list of jobs.
Provides a pageable list of all items that are backed up within a vault.

AzureFileshareProtectedItem.description: Azure File Share workload-specific backup item.

friendlyName.description: Friendly name of the fileshare represented by this backup item.

protectionStatus.description: Backup status of this backup item.

protectionState.description: Backup state of this backup item.

healthStatus.description: backups running status for this backup item.

lastBackupStatus.description: Last backup operation status. Possible values: Healthy, Unhealthy.

lastBackupTime.description: Timestamp of the last backup operation on this backup item.

extendedInfo.description: Additional information with this backup item.

AzureFileshareProtectedItemExtendedInfo.description: Additional information about Azure File Share backup item.

oldestRecoveryPoint.description: The oldest backup copy available for this item in the service.

recoveryPointCount.description: Number of available backup copies associated with this backup item.

policyState.description: Indicates consistency of policy object and policy applied to this backup item.

AzureIaaSClassicComputeVMProtectedItem.description: IaaS VM workload-specific backup item representing the Classic Compute VM.

AzureIaaSComputeVMProtectedItem.description: IaaS VM workload-specific backup item representing the Azure Resource Manager VM.

AzureIaaSVMErrorInfo.description: Azure IaaS VM workload-specific error information.

errorTitle.description: Title: Typically, the entity that the error pertains to.

recommendations.description: List of localized recommendations for above error code.

AzureIaaSVMHealthDetails.description: Azure IaaS VM workload-specific Health Details.

AzureIaaSVMJob.description: Azure IaaS VM workload-specific job object.

duration.description: Time elapsed during the execution of this job.

actionsInfo.description: Gets or sets the state/actions applicable on this job like cancel/retry.

errorDetails.description: Error details on execution of this job.

virtualMachineVersion.description: Specifies whether the backup item is a Classic or an Azure Resource Manager VM.

AzureIaaSVMJobExtendedInfo.description: Azure IaaS VM workload-specific additional information for job.

tasksList.description: List of tasks associated with this job.

progressPercentage.description: Indicates progress of the job. Null if it has not started or completed.

estimatedRemainingDuration.description: Time remaining for execution of this job.

dynamicErrorMessage.description: Non localized error message on job execution.

AzureIaaSVMJobTaskDetails.description: Azure IaaS VM workload-specific job task details.

taskExecutionDetails.description:
Details about execution of the task.
eg: number of bytes transfered etc

virtualMachineId.description: Fully qualified ARM ID of the virtual machine represented by this item.

protectionStatus.description: Backup status of this backup item.

healthDetails.description: Health details on this backup item.

extendedInfo.description: Additional information for this backup item.

oldestRecoveryPoint.description: The oldest backup copy available for this backup item.

recoveryPointCount.description: Number of backup copies available for this backup item.

policyInconsistent.description: Specifies if backup policy associated with the backup item is inconsistent.

protectedItemDataId.description: Internal ID of a backup item. Used by Azure SQL Backup engine to contact Recovery Services.

protectionState.description: Backup state of the backed up item.

extendedInfo.description: Additional information for this backup item.

oldestRecoveryPoint.description: The oldest backup copy available for this item in the service.

errorDetails.description: Error details on execution of this job.

storageAccountVersion.description: Specifies whether the Storage account is a Classic or an Azure Resource Manager Storage account.

tasksList.description: List of tasks for this job

dynamicErrorMessage.description: Non localized error message on job execution.

friendlyName.description: Friendly name of the DB represented by this backup item.

serverName.description: Host/Cluster Name for instance or AG

dynamicErrorMessage.description: Non localized error message on job execution.

diskLunList.description: List of Disks' Logical Unit Numbers (LUN) to be used for VM Protection.

isInclusionList.description: Flag to indicate whether DiskLunList is to be included/ excluded from backup.

recommendations.description: List of localized recommendations for above error code.

dpmServerName.description: DPM server name managing the backup item or backup job.

containerName.description: Name of cluster/server protecting current backup item, if any.

actionsInfo.description: The state/actions applicable on this job like cancel/retry.

DpmJobExtendedInfo.description: Additional information on the DPM workload-specific job.

tasksList.description: List of tasks associated with this job.

dynamicErrorMessage.description: Non localized error message on job execution.

friendlyName.description: Friendly name of the managed item

backupEngineName.description: Backup Management server protecting this backup item

extendedInfo.description: Extended info of the backup item.

DPMProtectedItemExtendedInfo.description: Additional information of DPM Protected item.

protectableObjectLoadPath.description: Attribute to provide information on various DBs.

protected.description: To check if backup item is disk protected.

isPresentOnCloud.description: To check if backup item is cloud protected.

lastBackupStatus.description: Last backup status information on backup item.

lastRefreshedAt.description: Last refresh time on backup item.

isCollocated.description: To check if backup item is collocated.

protectionGroupName.description: Protection group name of the backup item.

ErrorDetail.description: Error Detail class which encapsulates Code, Message and Recommendations.

message.description: Error Message related to the Code.

ExtendedProperties.description: Extended Properties for Azure IaasVM Backup.

policyState.description: Indicates consistency of policy object and policy applied to this backup item.

protectionState.description: Backup state of this backup item.

protectedItemId.description: Data Plane Service ID of the protected item.

sourceAssociations.description: Loosely coupled (type, value) associations (example - parent of a protected item)

fabricName.description: Name of this backup item's fabric.

expand.description: Specifies if the additional information should be provided for this item.

Job.description: Defines workload agnostic properties for a job.

entityFriendlyName.description: Friendly name of the entity on which the current job is executing.

backupManagementType.description: Backup management type to execute the current job.

jobType.description: This property will be used as the discriminator for deciding the specific types in the polymorhpic chain of types.

backupManagementType.description: Type of backup management for the job.

startTime.description: Job has started at this time. Value is in UTC.

endTime.description: Job has ended at this time. Value is in UTC.

generateExcelFileForExportJobs.description: True if excel file should be generated.

JobResource.description: Defines workload agnostic properties for a job.

friendlyName.description: Friendly name of this backup item.

computerName.description: Name of the computer associated with this backup item.

lastBackupTime.description: Timestamp of the last backup operation on this backup item.

deferredDeleteSyncTimeInUTC.description:
Sync time for deferred deletion.
This will get deprecated eventually. Use deferredDeleteTimeInUTC to show the time in DateTime format instead of in ticks

extendedInfo.description: Additional information with this backup item.

MabFileFolderProtectedItemExtendedInfo.description: Additional information on the backed up item.

lastRefreshedAt.description: Last time when the agent data synced to service.

recoveryPointCount.description: Number of backup copies associated with the backup item.

duration.description: Time taken by job to run.

actionsInfo.description: The state/actions applicable on jobs like cancel/retry.

mabServerName.description: Name of server protecting the DS.

MabJobExtendedInfo.description: Additional information for the MAB workload-specific job.

tasksList.description: List of tasks for this job.

dynamicErrorMessage.description: Non localized error message specific to this job.

backupManagementType.description: Type of backup management for the backed up item.

workloadType.description: Type of workload this item represents.

sourceResourceId.description: ARM ID of the resource to be backed up.

policyId.description: ID of the backup policy with which this item is backed up.

lastRecoveryPoint.description: Timestamp when the last (latest) backup copy was created for this backup item.

backupSetName.description: Name of the backup set the backup item belongs to

createMode.description: Create mode to indicate recovery of existing soft deleted data source or creation of new data source.

isScheduledForDeferredDelete.description: Flag to identify whether the DS is scheduled for deferred delete

deferredDeleteTimeRemaining.description: Time remaining before the DS marked for deferred delete is permanently deleted

IsDeferredDeleteScheduleUpcoming.description: Flag to identify whether the deferred deleted DS is to be purged soon

isRehydrate.description: Flag to identify that deferred deleted DS is to be rehydrated into Pause state

healthState.description: Health State for the backed up item.

backupManagementType.description: Backup management type for the backed up item.

itemType.description: Type of workload this item represents.

policyName.description: Backup policy name associated with the backup item.

id.description: Resource Id represents the complete path to the resource.

name.description: Resource name associated with the resource.

type.description: Resource type represents the complete path of the form Namespace/ResourceType/ResourceType/...

ResourceList.description: Base for all lists of resources.

nextLink.description: The uri to fetch the next page of resources. Call ListNext() fetches next page of resources.

ResourceGroupName.name: resourceGroupName
ResourceGroupName.description: The name of the resource group where the recovery services vault is present.

VaultName.name: vaultName
VaultName.description: The name of the recovery services vault.
